scripts.deploy:cloudflare: npm run build:cloudflare && npm run prepare:cloudflare-deploy && npx wrangler pages deploy .open-next/cloudflare-deploy --project-name=clases-bot
scripts.prepare:cloudflare-deploy: rm -rf .open-next/cloudflare-deploy && mkdir -p .open-next/cloudflare-deploy && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && if [ -d .open-next/assets/_next ]; then cp -r .open-next/assets/_next .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/_next; fi && if [ -f .open-next/assets/BUILD_ID ]; then cp .open-next/assets/BUILD_ID .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/BUILD_ID; fi && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/_worker.js && echo '{"version":1,"include":["/*"],"exclude":["/_next/static/*"]}' > .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/_routes.json
